titleStmt.title: The churches peace asserted upon a civil account as it was (great part of it) deliver'd in a sermon before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor in Guild-Hall-Chappel July 4 / by Ad. Littleton, presbyter.
titleStmt.author: Littleton, Adam, 1627-1694.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
